title: Scenario 1: Phishing Email
question: You receive an email asking you to urgently reset your password via a provided link. What should you do?
answer: Do not click the link. Verify the sender, report the email to security, and access the system only through the official website.

title: Scenario 2: Ransomware Alert
question: Your system suddenly shows a ransom note demanding payment. What is your first action?
answer: Disconnect the system from the network immediately and inform the incident response team. Do not pay the ransom.
